    • isPlaceFluids

      public boolean isPlaceFluids()
      If this item can place fluids when right-clicking (non-sneaking). The fluid will only be placed if the container has at least 1000 mB inside of it and will drain that accordingly.
      Returns:
      If it can place fluids.

    • isPickupFluids

      public boolean isPickupFluids()
      If this item can pick up fluids when right-clicking (non-sneaking).
      Returns:
      If it can pick up fluids.

    • setPlaceFluids

      public void setPlaceFluids(boolean placeFluids)
      Set whether or not this item should be able to place fluids in the world when right-clicking (non-sneaking). The fluid will only be placed if the container has at least 1000 mB inside of it and will drain that accordingly.
      Parameters:
      placeFluids - If it can place fluids.

    • canConsume

      public boolean canConsume(int amount, net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack itemStack, @Nullable net.minecraft.world.entity.player.Player player)
      If this container can consume a given fluid amount. Will also check other containers inside the player inventory.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount to drain.
      itemStack - The fluid container.
      player - The player.
      Returns:
      If the given amount can be drained.

    • consume

      public net.minecraftforge.fluids.FluidStack consume(int amount, net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack itemStack, @Nullable net.minecraft.world.entity.player.Player player)
      Consume a given fluid amount. Will also check other containers inside the player inventory.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount to drain.
      itemStack - The fluid container.
      player - The player.
      Returns:
      The fluid that was drained.
